name: Altra_Vermont_Farmhouse_6-Cube_Bookcase
reviews: Was not at all difficult to put together....did it alone in about 2 hours and I am a 70 year old woman. Be sure to check that you have all the parts and follow the instructions to the letter. Not good quality at all but believe you would need to have a really close look at it to detect a short-fall. Someone visiting your home and viewing the cabinet would think it sturdy an attractive. When I assemble furniture and have handled each piece I know each flaw but in time forget the tiny flaws and just enjoy the unit in total.
Easy to put together, looks very nice the quality is good
description: Give your books a stunning place to be displayed with the Altra Vermont Farmhouse 6-Cube Bookcase. This bookcase features a real wood veneer frame and doors with hand-painted glazed details for a beautiful, weathered-wood effect. Use the six large cubbies to stack your favorite books, magazines, DVDs or to showcase your decorative items. Use the lower concealed storage to keep other household items hidden but within easy reach. The warm Madison Cherry finish with a smooth glaze gives any room an instant update. Altra Vermont Farmhouse 6-Cube Bookcase requires assembly upon delivery.StyleTransitionalMaterialMDF, Metal, VeneerFinishCherry Finish, WeatheredShelf TypeBookshelves, Display, Media Cabinets, StorageAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownNumber of Shelf3
